name: HTML2
description:
HTML2

HTML2 is a hard game created with YoYoGames Game Maker and MS Paint. It is the successor of HTML1 (The impossible game). and will be the predecessor of the upcoming HTML3.

This game has 16+ levels, 3 bosses, approx. 75 objects (includes Entities and phases like Slimey and Sabotaged Missile Launchers) and 1 storyline (Yes, it did have one). The game has different enemies and blocks that have functions that will help (or challenge) you progress through the level.
The goal is simple: Help Slimey reach the red flag (That completes a level) but enemies and obstacles await! You think it's easy? Try it then!

Din't know if you'll gonna like the game? Watch my gameplays here

For HTML1, click here

 

Hint:

As you progress,

The experience may not be the best.

A dark patch in the code,

Puts it into hard mode.

This is not an overflow,

This is just your mind that's gonna blow.

But every step you take,

You're nearer to escape.
